document.full_text: exelon announced on thursday that it would buy constellation energy for $38.59 a share, the latest deal in a wave of consolidation among energy companies, particularly utilities.
document.title: exelon to buy constellation energy for $7.9 billion
lines_and_colors: exelon announced on thursday that it would buy constellation energy for $38.59 a share, the latest deal in a wave of consolidation among energy companies, particularly utilities.
